LanguageData.GDIWall.label: GDI wall
LanguageData.GDIWall.description: An impassable wall, reinforced by GDI engineers.
LanguageData.GDIWall_Blueprint.label: GDI wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDIWall_Frame.label: GDI wall (building)
LanguageData.GDI_Door.label: GDI door
LanguageData.GDI_Door.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.GDI_Door_Blueprint.label: GDI door (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_Door_Frame.label: GDI door (building)
LanguageData.GDI_Autodoor.label: GDI autodoor
LanguageData.GDI_Autodoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.GDI_Autodoor_Blueprint.label: GDI autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_Autodoor_Frame.label: GDI autodoor (building)
LanguageData.GDISecurity_WatchTower.label: Watch tower
LanguageData.GDISecurity_WatchTower.description: A GDI watch tower, fires automatically upon enemies.
LanguageData.GDISecurity_WatchTower_Blueprint.label: Watch tower (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDISecurity_WatchTower_Frame.label: Watch tower (building)
LanguageData.Gun_WatchTower.label: watchtower gun
LanguageData.Bullet_WatchTower.label: pew pew
LanguageData.GDISecurity_SonicEmitter.label: Sonic Emitter
LanguageData.GDISecurity_SonicEmitter.description: The sonic emitter, this heavy weapon clears anything in it's path.
LanguageData.GDISecurity_SonicEmitter_Blueprint.label: Sonic Emitter (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDISecurity_SonicEmitter_Frame.label: Sonic Emitter (building)
LanguageData.Gun_SonicEmitter.label: sonic emitter gun
LanguageData.Bullet_Emitter.label: emitter bullet
LanguageData.GDISecurity_Juggernaut.label: Juggernaut Artillery
LanguageData.GDISecurity_Juggernaut_Blueprint.label: Juggernaut Artillery (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDISecurity_Juggernaut_Frame.label: Juggernaut Artillery (building)
LanguageData.Gun_Juggernaut.label: juggernaut gun
LanguageData.Gun_Juggernaut.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Bullet_JuggernautBomb.label: explosive mortar shell
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorSmall.label: Sonic Inhibitor(s)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorSmall.description: A device designed to destroy Tiberium and prevent further growth. Due to the experimental nature of the device, it requires direct line of sight to the Tiberium to function. This small version has a smaller radius.
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorSmall_Blueprint.label: Sonic Inhibitor(s) (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorSmall_Frame.label: Sonic Inhibitor(s) (building)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorTall.label: Sonic Inhibitor(t)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorTall.description: A device designed to destroy Tiberium and prevent further growth. Due to the experimental nature of the device, it requires direct line of sight to the Tiberium to function. This tall version has a bigger radius.
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorTall_Blueprint.label: Sonic Inhibitor(t) (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitorTall_Frame.label: Sonic Inhibitor(t) (building)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer
LanguageData.Decrystallizer.description: Very slowly removes Tiberium from infected ground, converting any Tiberium ground into decrystallized soil that can be used again. Does not affect contaminated water. Requires power.
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Blueprint.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Blueprint_Install.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Frame.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (building)
LanguageData.SonicFence.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence
LanguageData.SonicFence.description: This fence allows you to cut off Tiberium spread. Requires power.
LanguageData.SonicFence_Blueprint.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicFence_Frame.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence (building)
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormWall_FSW.label: Firestorm Wall Segment
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormWall_FSW.description: A segment of the Firestorm system.
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormWall_FSW_Blueprint.label: Firestorm Wall Segment (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormWall_FSW_Frame.label: Firestorm Wall Segment (building)
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormDummy_FSW.label: Firestorm Segment
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormDummy_FSW.description: Powered Firestorm Segment, it is recommended that absolutely nothing steps on it.
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormCenter.label: Firestorm Operations Center
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormCenter.description: This specialized facility registers all Firestorm-Segments placed by this Faction. When enough power is available the Firestorm-System can be activated anytime and will last for a day, completely cutting off any intruders.
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormCenter_Blueprint.label: Firestorm Operations Center (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_FirestormCenter_Frame.label: Firestorm Operations Center (building)
